item.title: Create new class
item.description: From the Palette, expand the 'Classes' section, select Class then click on canvas. Set the name in the pop up dialog to 'Monitor'

item.title: Change 'Monitor' class key letter
item.description: Select 'Monitor' class, and change the class key letters in the Properties view to 'MONITOR'.

item.title: Create external entity
item.description: From the Palette, expand the 'External' section, select External Entity then click on canvas. Set the name in the pop up dialog to 'Logging'

item.title: Change 'Logging' external entity key letter
item.description: Select 'Logging' external entity, and change the external entity key letter from the properties view to 'LOG'

item.title: Add new bridge to 'Logging'
item.description: Right-click on 'Logging' external entity, and select New > Bridge Operation. Set the name in the pop up dialog to 'LogInfo'

item.title: Add new parameter to 'LogInfo' bridge
item.description: Select the 'LogInfo' bridge, right-click New > Parameter. Set the name in the pop up dialog to 'message'

item.title: Change the 'message' type
item.description: Select the 'message' parameter, right-click it and choose Set Type... > in the context menu. Select 'string' from the DataType Selection dialog.
